document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Cassalanter Villa on Diamond Street.
document_data.name: Cassalanter Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Cassalanter Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Cassalanter]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the southwest corner of where [[Diamond Street]] and [[Delzorin Street]] joined.{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained four separate buildings and several gardens. Each building stood between three and four stories tall.
